text: Flash Gordon is a 1996 animated science fiction television series. It is based on the Flash Gordon comic strip created by Alex Raymond in 1934. Flash has appeared in several movie serials, a 1980 Flash Gordon movie, two live action television series, and two earlier cartoon series, The New Adventures of Flash Gordon and Defenders of the Earth. title: Flash Gordon (1996 TV series)
